recipesJson.name: Tobacco mint meltaway #DevelopedFLV
recipesJson.author: Kurplop
recipesJson.description: This is a super smooth chocolate and mint tobacco. An after dinner vape that is just right and hits all of the notes.

reviews.text: This juice is fantastic, I've only been through a 30ml but I'm sure it could be an ADV especially for fall flavors!!  Great balance of tobacco, chocolate and a creamy mint finish.  Wonderful job on this recipe, thanks for sharing!! I gave it a week steep.
